H0.text: Who played Grandad in the UK television series ‘Only Fools and Horses’. Wilfrid Brambell

H1.text: Who played Grandad in the UK television series ‘Only Fools and Horses’. Leonard Rossiter

H2.text: Who played Grandad in the UK television series ‘Only Fools and Horses’. Richard Griffiths

H3.text: Who played Grandad in the UK television series ‘Only Fools and Horses’. Lennard Pearce

A4.text: He played Grandad in the BBC television sitcom Only Fools and Horses from its first episode in 1981 until his death in December 1984.

A5.text: In 1981, Pearce began his role as Grandad in the first three series of the BBC sitcom Only Fools and Horses.
